com.fishsemi.sdk.aircontrol

Class VideoCapture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fishsemi.sdk.aircontrol.VideoCapture

  • public class VideoCapture
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible to control photo/video capture of camera system on air board. It provides methods to take photo, start/stop video recording etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VideoCapture(AirController airController, int streamId, VideoCaptureListener listener)
      The constructor of VideoCapture
      VideoCapture(AirController airController, VideoStream videoStream, VideoCaptureListener listener)
      The constructor of VideoCapture

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Types.CaptureMode getCaptureMode()
      This method returns current capture mode of air camera system.
      int getFreeSpace()
      This method returns free memory space in air board for photo/video capture.
      int getStreamId()
      This method return the current video stream id for capture
      void setStreamId(int id)
      This method sets the video stream id for capture, it only works when video stream is not set.
      void setVideoStream(VideoStream videoStream)
      This method will bind to video stream, and will use the same video stream id.
      Types.RetValue startVideoRecording()
      This method is async request method, to start a request to start video recording.
      Types.RetValue stopVideoRecording()
      This method is async request method, to start a request to stop video recording.
      Types.RetValue takePhoto()
      This method is async request method, to start a request to take a photo.
      Types.RetValue toggleCaptureMode(Types.CaptureMode mode)
      This method is async request method, to start a request to toggle camera capture mode.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • VideoCapture

        public VideoCapture(AirController airController,
                    int streamId,
                    VideoCaptureListener listener)
        The constructor of VideoCapture
        Parameters:
        airController - the air controller
        streamId - the video stream id, from 1 to the count of video streams
        listener - the listener to receive information and result of async request

      • VideoCapture

        public VideoCapture(AirController airController,
                    VideoStream videoStream,
                    VideoCaptureListener listener)
        The constructor of VideoCapture
        Parameters:
        airController - the air controller
        videoStream - the video stream to be captured
        listener - the listener to receive information and result of async request

    • Method Detail

      • getCaptureMode

        public Types.CaptureMode getCaptureMode()
        This method returns current capture mode of air camera system.
        Returns:
        the capture mode.

      • getFreeSpace

        public int getFreeSpace()
        This method returns free memory space in air board for photo/video capture.
        Returns:
        the free memory space in air board in MB.

      • getStreamId

        public int getStreamId()
        This method return the current video stream id for capture
        Returns:
        the video stream id

      • setStreamId

        public void setStreamId(int id)
        This method sets the video stream id for capture, it only works when video stream is not set.
        Parameters:
        id - the video stream id

      • setVideoStream

        public void setVideoStream(VideoStream videoStream)
        This method will bind to video stream, and will use the same video stream id.
        Parameters:
        videoStream - the video stream

      • startVideoRecording

        public Types.RetValue startVideoRecording()
        This method is async request method, to start a request to start video recording.
        Returns:
        whether the async request is accepted or not, and the failure reason

      • stopVideoRecording

        public Types.RetValue stopVideoRecording()
        This method is async request method, to start a request to stop video recording.
        Returns:
        whether the async request is accepted or not, and the failure reason

      • takePhoto

        public Types.RetValue takePhoto()
        This method is async request method, to start a request to take a photo.
        Returns:
        whether the async request is accepted or not, and the failure reason

      • toggleCaptureMode

        public Types.RetValue toggleCaptureMode(Types.CaptureMode mode)
        This method is async request method, to start a request to toggle camera capture mode. It's better to toggle to photo mode before taking picture and toggle to video mode before starting video recording, which will save their response time.
        Parameters:
        mode - the capture mode to toggle to.
        Returns:
        whether the async request is accepted or not, and the failure reason
